name: 7th World Conference on Research in Education
content: The world of education is a dynamic, ever-evolving field. The continuous exchange of information, best practices, and cross-border learning are essential to understand global trends, identifying challenges and their causes, and addressing pressing concerns. The 7th World Conference on Research in Education (WORLDCRE) aims to do exactly that. Bringing together academia, researchers, and scholars to Milan between the 23rd and 25th of February, education research conferences 2024 will look into the latest innovative strategies, insightful research findings, and practical solutions to both global and national challenges. It also presents a unique opportunity to get published in prestigious academic journals, share your findings with an extensive academic community, and learn from world-class speakers.
